page.title: 02FARMING.
page.content: Farming is one of the basic industries of }SUFFOLK}, and this area illustrates major changes that have taken place in agriculture since the turn of the century. The town of {IPSWICH} has always been an important town for Suffolk farming, the large firm of Ransomes has supplied not only local farmers but also the rest of the world with agricultural machinery. Whilst fertiliser has always been available from the local Fisons factory. It is the {SUGAR-BEET} industry which dominates the landscape, with the smell from the nearby sugar-beet factory being strong when the wind is from the west during the winter harvest months. Barley and wheat are the other two main crops planted by the local farmers.
